headline: Space Preview: Peering Into the Universe With 2020 Vision
abstract: A year full of highs and lows in space just ended, and the 12 months to come  will be full of new highlights in orbit and beyond.
lead_paragraph: If you follow space news and astronomy, the past year offered no shortage of highlights. Astronomers provided humanity’s first glimpse of a black hole. China landed on the moon’s far side. And the 50th anniversary of the Apollo 11 moon landing inspired us to look ahead to our future in space.
